name: Party Chaos
description:
A cool cartoon-like game in which you can compete with or against your friends in various minigames. To win you have to reach the goal on the board.

Minigames?

You are going to play various Minigames in one Game. The Minigames are a wild mix between strategy and fun Challenges. Replay games that you loved to play in your childhood in another way. There are parkur Minigames where you have to finish first. There are Boxing like Game modes where you go head to head against you opponents.
